item.description:
Invited Groups are Melody's Wakefield Weeknights, Tonya's Boston Happy Hour 

Please join us for a 2012 Red Sox Natives Exclusive Event! 

Join us at Scoreboard for a Patriots Game Viewing Party to watch the New England Patriots take on the Buffalo Bills on Sunday, November 11.

Arrive early after Noon time to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing. This will be an informal gathering in dining area with a reserved table. We strongly suggest that fans arrive early to be a part of the table reservation.

Game Time is 1:00pm.

SCOREBOARD SERVES FREE WINGS AT HALFTIME!

Scoreboard Manager and Assistant Organizer Lauren will have a full house. 

Expect some specials, give-aways and surprises in the house. 

There is no event fee.

Stay for the whole game or leave whenever.

The Red Sox Natives organized weekly viewing parties last year with guests from several other invited groups attending. We had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

Scoreboard has been one of our venues for watching Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins and Celtics games over the past several years.

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has over 50 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. Parking is free. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVERS.

Space is limited.

We hope to see you there!

The Red Sox Natives team.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Lauren or the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to other Meetup people ( Cat & Red Sox Natives group) or request a table
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party at Scoreboard--Buffalo Bills @ Patriots Home Game
